title: 8 Ways to Travel More Sustainably in 2025
title_zh: 2025年更可持续旅行的八种方式
author: Sarah Reid
summary: A Booking.com report found sustainability is important to 84% of global travellers, yet nearly half are confused about what sustainable travel means. With environmental pressures intensifying, 2025 is a crucial year to rethink how we travel. This article offers practical ways to make impactful choices: regenerative trips, community awareness, mindful accommodation, low-carbon transport, deep cultural connections, helpful apps, spotting greenwashing, and leveraging travel privilege for good.
summary_zh: Booking.com 的报告发现，84%的全球旅行者认为可持续性很重要，但近一半人对可持续旅行意味着什么感到困惑。随着环境压力加剧，2025年是重新思考我们旅行方式的关键一年。本文提供实用的方法：再生型旅行、社区意识、有意识的住宿选择、低碳交通、深度文化连接、实用应用、识别漂绿以及利用旅行特权做好事。

paragraphs.en: You are ready to book your next holiday, and you are aware of the importance of minimising your travel footprint. But where do you begin? If you are stumped, you are not alone. A new Booking.com report found sustainability is important to 84% of global travellers. But while the desire to travel greener is strong, the path to eco-tourism is unclear for many. A Trip.com study found that nearly half of travellers are confused about what sustainable travel actually means, while cost remains a major barrier.
paragraphs.zh: 你准备好预订下一次假期，也知道减少旅行足迹的重要性。但你该从哪里开始？如果你感到困惑，你并不孤单。Booking.com 的一项新报告发现，84%的全球旅行者认为可持续性很重要。尽管绿色旅行的愿望很强烈，但对许多人来说，通往生态旅游的道路并不清晰。Trip.com 的一项研究发现，近一半的旅行者对可持续旅行究竟意味着什么感到困惑，而成本仍然是一个主要障碍。

notes.explain: 旅行足迹，指旅行对环境的影响
困惑；不知所措，非正式用法

paragraphs.en: As you plan your holidays for 2025 and beyond, experts recommend asking whether you want to be a passive tourist or a visitor who makes a positive impact. A regenerative-focused trip could involve hands-on conservation at an Ecuadorian ecolodge or choosing an Australian hiking experience helping to revive Aboriginal culture. Fiji's Loloma Hour encourages travellers to dedicate at least one hour to environmental, cultural or social impact. Hawaii's Mālama experiences encourage visitors to give back through habitat restoration and beach cleanups.
paragraphs.zh: 当你规划2025年及以后的假期时，专家建议问问自己想成为被动游客还是产生积极影响的访客。以再生为重点的旅行可以包括在厄瓜多尔生态旅馆亲手参与保护工作，或选择帮助复兴原住民文化的澳大利亚徒步体验。斐济的 Loloma Hour 鼓励旅行者至少花一小时参与环境、文化或社会影响活动。夏威夷的 Mālama 体验鼓励游客通过栖息地恢复和海滩清理来回馈。

notes.explain: 亲身参与的保护工作；hands-on 表示亲自动手的

paragraphs.en: In 2025, travellers are increasingly aware of the social and cultural impacts of tourism. For the first time, more than half of global travellers are aware of tourism's impact on local communities as well as the environment. With overtourism protests ramping up and unaffordable housing in popular destinations, there is a growing call to be more mindful about how, when and where we travel. Steering clear of popular destinations at peak times, hiring local guides and purchasing more mindfully can all help reduce pressure on communities.
paragraphs.zh: 2025年，旅行者越来越意识到旅游业对社会和文化的影响。首次有超过一半的全球旅行者同时意识到旅游业对当地社区和环境的影响。随着过度旅游抗议活动增加，热门目的地住房不可负担，人们越来越呼吁更谨慎地思考我们如何、何时以及在哪里旅行。避开高峰期的热门目的地、雇用当地导游、更有意识地购物都有助于减轻对社区的压力。

notes.explain: 加剧；增加；ramp up 表示逐步加强

paragraphs.en: Hotels contribute a large proportion of the CO2 emitted by the tourism sector, but better options are emerging. The world's first carbon-positive hotel opened in the US in 2024, and IHG launched its first branded net-zero hotel in the UK in March 2025. In South Africa, a zero-waste, renewable energy-powered safari lodge is working to rewild 50,000 hectares. Becken recommends checking for international certification like B Corp, EarthCheck, Green Globe and Green Key when choosing accommodation.
paragraphs.zh: 酒店贡献了旅游业排放二氧化碳的很大一部分，但更好的选择正在出现。世界上第一家碳正酒店于2024年在美国开业，IHG 于2025年3月在英国推出了首家品牌净零酒店。在南非，一家零浪费、可再生能源驱动的野生动物园旅馆正在努力让5万公顷土地重新野化。贝肯建议在选择住宿时查看 B Corp、EarthCheck、Green Globe 和 Green Key 等国际认证。

notes.explain: 碳正，指吸收的碳多于排放的碳
重新野化；恢复自然生态系统

paragraphs.en: Air travel remains one of the most carbon-intensive parts of tourism, and sustainable aviation fuels alone cannot solve aviation's soaring emissions. In good news for rail enthusiasts, 2025 brings new lower-impact routes: the Indian Pacific has extended its journey across Australia; Italy's La Dolce Vita Orient Express made its inaugural run; Portugal's high-speed network will connect Madrid to Lisbon in three hours. When you do fly, choose low-emissions flights via Google Flights, book economy seats and prioritise direct flights.
paragraphs.zh: 航空旅行仍然是旅游业碳密集程度最高的部分之一，仅靠可持续航空燃料无法解决航空排放的飙升。对于铁路爱好者来说是个好消息，2025年带来了新的低碳路线：印度洋太平洋号延长了穿越澳大利亚的旅程；意大利的 La Dolce Vita 东方快车完成了首航；葡萄牙的高速网络将把马德里和里斯本三小时连接起来。当你必须乘飞机时，通过 Google Flights 选择低排放航班，预订经济舱并优先选择直飞。

notes.explain: 飙升的排放；soaring 表示急剧上升的

paragraphs.en: One of the most sustainable ways to learn about a place is to book an Indigenous-led tour. Record demand for First Nations experiences in Australia has coincided with new 2025 tours, including a Byron Bay storytelling walk. Native tourism is booming in North America too. Meanwhile, citizen science and hands-on conservation activities allow travellers to engage with destinations on a deeper level. A Kenya Rhino Conservation Safari includes behind-the-scenes talks with conservationists in leading private conservancies.
paragraphs.zh: 了解一个地方最可持续的方式之一是预订原住民主导的旅行。澳大利亚对原住民体验的空前需求与2025年新推出的旅行不谋而合，包括拜伦湾故事徒步。北美原住民旅游也在蓬勃发展。与此同时，公民科学和亲身参与的保护活动让旅行者能以更深层次的方式参与目的地。肯尼亚犀牛保护野生动物园包括与主要私人保护区的保护学家进行幕后对话。

notes.explain: 原住民主导的；由本土人群运营的
公民科学；公众参与的科学项目

paragraphs.en: Deceptive sustainability claims, known as greenwashing, have become increasingly prevalent in tourism. In 2024, major airlines were accused of making misleading sustainability claims. New European legislation called the Green Claims Directive will make it much harder for companies to greenwash. Until then, consumers must stay sharp. Use resources like Sustainable Travel International's guide to avoiding greenwashing, and do not underestimate the value of guest reviews for honest insights into whether a property truly lives up to its promises.
paragraphs.zh: 被称为漂绿的欺骗性可持续性声明在旅游业中越来越普遍。2024年，主要航空公司被指控做出误导性的可持续性声明。欧洲新立法《绿色声明指令》将使企业漂绿难度大大增加。在此之前，消费者必须保持警惕。使用可持续旅行国际等资源来避免漂绿，不要低估客人评论的价值，它们能真实反映酒店是否兑现承诺。

vocabulary.example: Regenerative travel reverses damage to destinations.
The lodge is working to rewild 50,000 hectares.
Greenwashing has become prevalent in tourism.
Talks with conservationists in private conservancies.

discussion_questions.en: Which of the eight sustainable travel tips would be easiest or hardest for you to adopt? Why?
discussion_questions.zh: 这八种可持续旅行建议中，哪一种对你来说最容易或最难采纳？为什么？

discussion_questions.en: How can travellers tell the difference between genuine sustainability and greenwashing?
discussion_questions.zh: 旅行者如何区分真正的可持续性和漂绿？

discussion_questions.en: The article mentions "leveraging your privilege" when travelling. What does this mean to you?
discussion_questions.zh: 文章提到旅行时「利用你的特权」。这对你意味着什么？
